scripts.build: bun build --entrypoints src/extension.ts --outfile dist/extension.js --target node --format cjs --external vscode
scripts.build:production: bun build --entrypoints src/extension.ts --outfile dist/extension.js --target node --format cjs --external vscode --minify
scripts.build:production:watch: bun build --watch --entrypoints src/extension.ts --outfile dist/extension.js --target node --format cjs --external vscode --minify
